author: Josh Gerstein
title: Barr to speed releases at federal prisons hard hit by virus
description: Attorney general exercises new authority to move inmates to home confinement due to emergency.
content:
Barr also said he was exercising for the first time expanded release authority Congress granted him in the stimulus bill known as the Cares Act that was signed into law by President Donald Trump last Friday.
Under previous law, federal prisoners were only el… [+1119 chars]
